posts.content:
I am selling a couple of rear hatches, this one was bought in error, its totally rust free being a US import, the only issue is a very small dent. Never been stripped or anything so no hidden horrors.

Happy to take to VolksWorld (Saturday) or collect from Farnborough Hants, or I might be able to ship it but would need to check cost after packaging.

Asking Â£250 which is what it cost me.
